description: Agroclúster is an initiative aimed at enhancing the conditions of small and medium-sized producers in Colombia. Established as a consultancy, it focuses on providing specialized technical assistance, rural extension, and technological support. By addressing marketing challenges and improving infrastructure, Agroclúster connects farmers with consumers and wholesalers, promoting sustainable agricultural practices and innovative technologies to ensure regenerative and high-precision farming across various Colombian regions.
name: Agroclúster
